definition_en: The specific chemical and physical conditions (temperature, pressure, chemistry) of the coolant within a reactor system that can influence the degradation or performance of materials.
definition_ko: 원자로 계통 내 냉각재의 특정 화학적, 물리적 조건(온도, 압력, 화학 성분)으로, 재료의 열화 또는 성능에 영향을 미칠 수 있는 환경.

slots.context_ko: Effects of LWR Coolant Environments on Fatigue Design Curves of Austenitic Stainless Steels
